Song Machine Radio

Release dates:

Episode 1: 19th October 2020
Episode 2: 6th November 2020
Episode 3: 24th November 2020
Episode 4: 8th December 2020

Where to listen: https://music.apple.com/us/curator/song-machine-radio-with-gorllaz/1526878041?app=music&ls=1&at=&ct=cur_am1_songmachine_gen&itscg=80172&itsct=cur_am1_songmachine_gen

This radio show aired on Apple Music 1 to celebrate the 20th anniversary of Gorillaz. Each episode was hosted by each of the band members; with several of their own songs, songs by their collaborators & interviews with them.

Episodes:

Episode 1 [2-D]
Episode 2 [Russel Hobbs]
Episode 3 [Noodle]
Episode 4 [Murdoc]
The Gorillaz Art Book Podcast

Release date: 17th June 2022

Where to listen: http://gorill.az/artbookpodcast

This podcast features Kate Bryan interviewing various artists who worked on The Gorillaz Art Book.

Episodes:

0. The Gorillaz Art Book – Trailer
1. Holly Warburton
2. Ruff Mercy
3. Jared Cody Wolf
4. Vanesa R. Del Rey
5. Jamie Hewlett
